title: 1999/161/EC: Council Decision of 22 February 1999 appointing a member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 22 February 1999 appointing a member of the Committee of the Regions (1999/161/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 198a thereof,
Having regard to Council Decision 98/110/EC of 26 January 1998 (1), appointing members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions,
Whereas a seat as a member of the Committee has become vacant following the resignation of Mr Peter J. Peacock, notified to the Council on 4 January 1999;
Having regard to the proposal from the United Kingdom Government,
main_body: Mr Lewis Smith is hereby appointed a member of the Committee of the Regions in place of Mr Peter J. Peacock for the remainder of his term of office, which runs until 25 January 2002.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 22 February 1999.
For the Council
The President
H.-F. von PLOETZ
(1) OJ L 28, 4. 2. 1998, p. 19.
